title: league starting screen dosent work and is dark
body:
my friend is having a problem whit lol. for some reason it wont let him pass the welcome screen.
https://postimg.org/image/wbt7anryn/
if someone knows something about this problem it will help a ton.

replies.body: Your patcher is trying to pop-up a message about the open beta but failing to show up, which is why your patcher is dimmed.  I've seen some reports on this, and there might be a workaround for just this instance.  Try re-launching the patcher in Windows 7 Compatibility mode, which can be found through rightclicking lol and selecting the compatibility pane.  Hopefully that does the trick, and if it does make sure to disable the compatibility afterwards.
it worked thx :). now u only need to buff shyvana and all will be perfect XD.

Just launch it with --no-sandbox parameter. it helped me to solve "nothing appearing, then black screen" issue


I.e. create shortcut of it and open properties, at the end add that parameter so it will look like

"C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\LeagueClient.exe" --no-sandbox
